emails.title: some kinda robot
emails.body:
Dear Strong Bad,
Do you take your wrestling mask and boxing gloves off before you go to bed?
Sincerely,
Abdi LaRue
San Diego, CA

emails.title: homsar
emails.body:
Hi Strong Bad,
If you hate Homsar so much, why don't you kill him?
-Vinnie C.

emails.title: butt IQ
emails.body:
Dear Mr Bad,
How do you know if someone's butt is stupid? I mean, is there like some kind of IQ test?
Crapfully yours,
Tyler

emails.title: making out
emails.body:
Dear Strong Bad..,
Do you like making out? Because my boyfriend won't... mostly because he's jealous of you. I've tried the whole Peter Frampton thang, but nothing seems to work out. Please help me Strong Bad...
Kissless in Santa Rosa

emails.title: depressio
emails.body:
Dear Strong Bad,
Tell Strong Sad he is dumb and a crappy guy ,
Your fan,
Anthony
from South Gate CA

emails.title: halloweener
emails.body:
Dear Strongbad,
I want to have the bestest halloween costume ever this year. How can I make a strongbad costume?
With crap,
Ben from Ohio University

emails.title: brianrietta
emails.body:
Dear Strong Bad,
Every time I watch a cartoon with you in it, I can't help but realize how incredibly gorgeous you are. I love the way you walk around without your shirt on so confidently. Anyways, I was wondering if you would like to go out sometime. Give me a call, Pom-Pom has my number.

Hopefully yours,
Brian

emails.title: trevor the vampire
emails.body: Hi strong bad. this is trevor from Hampden Maine and I was wondering if you could teach me how to be as awesome as you. I am a vampire and
